title: Syrian woman develops GPS-equipped lifejacket
text:
Syrian woman develops GPS-equipped lifejacket 1:16pm EDT - 01:41 
A Syrian refugee living in Jordan develops a lifejacket with a GPS tracking device, hoping it will save the lives of migrants attempting the dangerous journey across the Mediterranean. Angela Moore reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A Syrian refugee living in Jordan develops a lifejacket with a GPS tracking device, hoping it will save the lives of migrants attempting the dangerous journey across the Mediterranean.
